titleStmt.title: On St. Paul's Cathedrall represented by Mr. Dan. King
titleStmt.author: King, Daniel, d. 1664?, engr.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sould by Iohn Ouerton at the White Horse without Newgate at the corner of the little old Baly neere the Fountaine Tauern,

notesStmt.note: In verse, with Latin and English texts.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
